description: Try our easy to follow YoPRO Blueberry Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: YoPRO Blueberry Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup YoPro plain yoghurt, room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 200°C fan forced and line a 12-hole muffin tin (you will only need)
In a bowl, whisk flour, soda, baking powder, protein and sugar together
Whisk eggs, milk and yoghurt in another bowl together
Melt coconut oil and butter together

Pour half the egg mix into the dry mix and fold through, then report until nearly combined, then add in butter, oil and blueberries and fold through until just combined (don't overmix as it will give you tough muffins!)
bake for 5 mins at 200°C, then turn the oven down to 160°C and bake for a further 20 minutes, or until golden and cooked through
